io.github.splotycode.mosaik.gameengine.gameloop

Interface GameLoop

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TickFrameLoop, TPSGameLoop, UnInteruplyGameLoop

    public interface GameLoop
    A GameLoop is a the Main Loop in a Game It is used to time the tick and executes TickExecutor#runTick
    See Also:
    TickExecutor, TickFrameLoop, TPSGameLoop, UnInteruplyGameLoop

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void end()
      End the Gameloop You might not start it again if you end it
      TickExecutor getTickExecutor()
      Returns the current TickExecutor (null if not present)
      boolean isRunning() 
      default void pause()
      Pauses the Loop You can use unPause to run it after you paused it
      void postTick()
      Executed after a tick
      void preTick()
      Executed before a new tick begins
      void runTick()
      Calls a tick
      void setTickExecutor(TickExecutor tickExecutor)
      Sets the Tick Executor for this loop.
      void start()
      Starts the loop for the first time You need to specify the TickExecutor first with setTickExecutor
      void start(TickExecutor tickExecutor)
      Starts the loop for the first time
      default void unPause()
      Unpauses a loop The loop need to be paused before

    • Method Detail

      • getTickExecutor

        TickExecutor getTickExecutor()
        Returns the current TickExecutor (null if not present)
        Returns:
        the current TickExecutor

      • setTickExecutor

        void setTickExecutor(TickExecutor tickExecutor)
        Sets the Tick Executor for this loop. You mal only use this method while the loop is paused/hasn't started
        Parameters:
        tickExecutor - the new Tick Executor

      • pause

        default void pause()
        Pauses the Loop You can use unPause to run it after you paused it

      • unPause

        default void unPause()
        Unpauses a loop The loop need to be paused before

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning()
        Returns:
        true if the look is running and false if it does'nt

      • start

        void start(TickExecutor tickExecutor)
        Starts the loop for the first time
        Parameters:
        tickExecutor - the tickexecutor for the gameloop

      • start

        void start()
        Starts the loop for the first time You need to specify the TickExecutor first with setTickExecutor

      • end

        void end()
        End the Gameloop You might not start it again if you end it

      • runTick

        void runTick()
        Calls a tick

      • preTick

        void preTick()
        Executed before a new tick begins

      • postTick
